::Spears::

She smiled and kissed Prebon.  "I'll be happy to, My master." She 
nuzzled against him.  She was starting to forget all about Striker.
She held onto Prebon's arm and sighed.  The chip was taking her over 
a little more each hour.  She still had Striker in the back of her 
mind, but she no longer felt that he was in danger.  She was starting 
to care more about Prebon than Striker.  Soon, by the end of the day, 
she wouldn't even know who Striker was.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> 
> Prebon
> 
> Prebonb kissed Spears back as he answered her demand.
> 
> "I'm sorry, but I need to be focused on talking to Ramulus. Hammer 
> and Ignatius will have to hold you, but I'll tell you what." Prebon 
> said, putting his hand on Spears' cheek, "You can hold me prisoner 
> when we get back, if you know what I mean."
>  He kissed her again.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Vulois
> 
> Vulois broke off the mental link with Child. Vulois could have 
> guessed that his faced had aged and matured.
> 
> "There. Your power has been unlocked. Your power rivals mine, if 
not 
> beats it. Come. let us vanquish the demons of this mountain."
> 
> Vulois got up and beckoned for Child to follow him.
